document_data.caption: A map showing Gondalim's (labeled #173) on Burnt Wagon Way.
document_data.name: Gondalim's
document_data.mainbody: '''Gondalim's''' was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: Gondalim's was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] where the [[Winter Path]] and [[Burnt Wagon Way]] joined just east of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
